entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 09:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
